Sentencas: High temperature electrolysis of water using solid oxide electrochemical cells (SOEC) is a promising technology for hydrogen production with high energy efficiency and may promote decarbonization when coupled with renewable energy sources and excess heat from nuclear reactors.
Titulo: Challenges in practical button cell testing for hydrogen production from high temperature electrolysis of water

Sentencas: Over the past several decades there have been extensive scientific and engineering studies on cell materials and degradation behaviors that have greatly improved current density, decreased total resistance, and lowered degradation rates.
Titulo: Challenges in practical button cell testing for hydrogen production from high temperature electrolysis of water

Sentencas: Although the technology is now at a near-commercial level, maintaining consistency in cell testing and minimizing variance in practical testing environments is an often overlooked but crucial topic.
Titulo: Challenges in practical button cell testing for hydrogen production from high temperature electrolysis of water

Sentencas: To promote high quality data collection, testing procedures and balance of plant component details are extremely important to consider.
Titulo: Challenges in practical button cell testing for hydrogen production from high temperature electrolysis of water

Sentencas: This work discusses some key factors affecting the reproducibility of practical SOEC testing on the button cell level, namely, current collection layers, cell sealing procedures, the reliability of steam and hydrogen delivery systems, cell testing fixture design, and reduction procedures.
Titulo: Challenges in practical button cell testing for hydrogen production from high temperature electrolysis of water

Sentencas: To provide a baseline and a level of standardization for the SOEC community, this work also discloses details of the standard operating procedure and techniques adopted for o-SOEC testing at Idaho National Laboratory (INL).
Titulo: Challenges in practical button cell testing for hydrogen production from high temperature electrolysis of water
